410810.name: Battle of Empires : 1914-1918 - Real War
410810.description:
You want to feel the brutality of World War I?
"Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - Real War" modifies the settings of all units, bringing them as much as possible to reality, adds the effects of explosions, toxic gases, injuries.
Take care of your infantry - now it can be wounded by barbed wire, lose their limbs or be seriously poisoned by gas. To enhance the atmosphere of WW1, we have added a map with lots of World War I entourage - trenches, numerous barbed wire, the lunar landscape, created by explosions. Feel the most realistic atmosphere of the Great War.
410810.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 法语, 乌克兰语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
